questions so what's the the thing we are describing here what's the system we are describing what's the scope of that
systems and what features sit inside the system what features sit outside the system boundary what types of users roles actors
personas are using this system and what types of things are they doing and what are the system integration points that
we need to support So if you answer those questions you can draft up something like a system context diagram
